## First order univariate derivatives:

### A)
```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)

df_dx = D(expr = fx, 'x')
df_dx

x = 3
eval(expr = df_dx)
```

### B)
```{r}
Pa <- expression(2 * ((3*a + 2)^4) - 5)

dP_da = D(expr = Pa, 'a')
dP_da

a = 1.2
eval(expr = dP_da)
```

### C)
```{r}
gt <- expression((-4*t)/(((t^2) + 1)^3))

dg_dt = D(expr = gt, 't')
dg_dt

t = 0
eval(dg_dt)
```
